data.message: Dear FB - I am not so happy with the new "stories" section added to messenger. Personally I am not interested in it since I have other accounts fulfilling this duty. What bothers me is how much space it occupies, when I am only interested in my messages. Visually it is not appealing to me. In the future, will you consider to make it an option to hide/disable the stories section for people who have no interest in this? Thanks and happy New Years.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Sheena. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2ip0Rcg. -Rhea
